td.content: diffuse slowing with generalized spike and wave pattern

td.content: s:a white m financial manager aged 30 years presents with moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments, moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat for past 7 weeks. he denies smoking he is a chronic alcoholic o:Height 73 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

s:patient presents with 6 weeks history of moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. he is a M aged 30 years. he denies ever using cigarettes consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily o:Height 73 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered pure tone audiometry.

s:pt says he is having symptoms of Neurological 10 x week, in spite of treatment. he is a male financial manager aged 30 Ys. consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 73 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Epilepsy p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed phenobarbitol - 50 mg 2-3 x per day, and ordered Vagal nerve stimulator - brain.

td.content: s:a male aged 31 yrs presents with 5 weeks history of Neurological. o:Height 73 in, Weight 118 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Epilepsy p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed phenytoin - 20 mg/kg daily, and ordered Electroencephalogram.

s:a white male aged 31 yrs presents with moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments, moderate pain and discharge in ear. pt also reports of moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. o:Height 72 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dexamethasone - 0.4 mL 3-4 drops in both ears 2-3 x per day, and ordered pure tone audiometry.
